original: @117a pha ga mo'i srung ba'i 'khor lo la /
analyzed: @117a pha ga mo'i srung ba'i 'khor lo la /
translated: In the protection wheel of the sow,

original: zangs gzhong gi nang du rang byung gi khrag dang / dngul chu zangs rdog ma gcig gis zhag par mnye /
analyzed: zangs gzhong gi nang du rang byung gi khrag dang / dngul chu zangs rdog ma gcig gis zhag par mnye /
translated: in a copper basin, mix together natural blood and mercury with a piece of copper.

original: de thang ba'i zur gyi grvar btsir la /
analyzed: de thang ba'i zur gyi grvar btsir la /
translated: When that is dry, press it in the corner of the cloth.

original: zhu ba de zangs srab mo'am gro ga la sogs pa la 'khor lo ji lta ba bzhin du bris /
analyzed: zhu ba de zangs srab mo'am gro ga la sogs pa la 'khor lo ji lta ba bzhin du bris /
translated: Draw the dissolved [mixture] on thin copper or birch bark, and so on, in the form of a wheel.

original: de la rab gnas byas te snyim par bcug la /
analyzed: de la rab gnas byas te snyim par bcug la /
translated: Having consecrated it, place it in the palm of the hand.

original: phag mo'i rkang pa brgyad pa brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas la dril nas /
analyzed: phag mo'i rkang pa brgyad pa brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas la dril nas /
translated: Recite the eight-line praise of Vārāhī one hundred and eight times, wrap it in silk,

original: sngar btsir ba'i tshigs mas rab byung yin na thang ba'i zur du gtums la phrag pa g-yon par bkal /
analyzed: sngar btsir ba'i tshigs mas rab byung yin na thang ba'i zur du gtums la phrag pa g-yon par bkal /
translated: and if one is a renunciate, wrap it in the cloth that was pressed before and carry it on the left shoulder.

original: skra can yin na gong ba g-yon par gtum mo //
analyzed: skra can yin na gong ba g-yon par gtum mo //
translated: If one has hair, wrap it in the left lapel.

original: drag po mngon spyod kyi las la ;
analyzed: drag po mngon spyod kyi las la ;
translated: For wrathful, violent activities,

original: gzhung nas byung ba ltar gzugs brnyan byas te /
analyzed: gzhung nas byung ba ltar gzugs brnyan byas te /
translated: make an effigy as it appears in the treatise.

original: ske tshe'i mar khu bsku /
analyzed: ske tshe'i mar khu bsku /
translated: Smear it with mustard-seed oil.

original: rang gi sngas su drag po'i thab khung gru gsum pa gcig bru /
analyzed: rang gi sngas su drag po'i thab khung gru gsum pa gcig bru /
translated: Dig a wrathful, triangular hearth at one’s pillow.

original: de tsher ma can gyi shing la dur khrod kyi sol dum gyi me sbar ba dang / gzugs brnyan de lcags kyi skam pas bzung ste /
analyzed: de tsher ma can gyi shing la dur khrod kyi sol dum gyi me sbar ba dang / gzugs brnyan de lcags kyi skam pas bzung ste /
translated: At that time, light a fire of charnel ground charcoals in a thorny tree, and hold the effigy with iron tongs.

original: dmar lhang gis ma song bar du bsro'o //
analyzed: dmar lhang gis ma song bar du bsro'o //
translated: Heat it until it is red.

original: de ltar song ba dang dug gi chu'am bong bu'i chus bsad la /
analyzed: de ltar song ba dang dug gi chu'am bong bu'i chus bsad la /
translated: When it is like that, kill it with poisoned water or donkey water.

original: de dong du bcug nas g-yom pa la phag mo'i 'khor lo bris pa gcig gis kha bcad /
analyzed: de dong du bcug nas g-yom pa la phag mo'i 'khor lo bris pa gcig gis kha bcad /
translated: Having put it in a pit, cover the mouth with a wheel of a sow.

original: sngags bzlas / ling ga yang dang yang du bsro zhing bsgrub /
analyzed: sngags bzlas / ling ga yang dang yang du bsro zhing bsgrub /
translated: Recite the mantra, and heat and practice the effigy again and again.

original: bsad pa'i sngags go cha'i lha mo'i sngags la m'a ra ya btags shing bzlas so //
analyzed: bsad pa'i sngags go cha'i lha mo'i sngags la m'a ra ya btags shing bzlas so //
translated: The mantra for killing is the mantra of the armor goddess with “mara ya” added.

original: sngon du bsnyen pa'i cho ga dang / de nas sgrub pa'i cho ga'o //
analyzed: sngon du bsnyen pa'i cho ga dang / de nas sgrub pa'i cho ga'o //
translated: The ritual of prior service and then the ritual of practice.

original: de la bsnyen pa ni gnas dben pas stan bde ba la 'dug ste /
analyzed: de la bsnyen pa ni gnas dben pas stan bde ba la 'dug ste /
translated: As for the service, sit on a comfortable seat in an isolated place.

original: gtor ma la sogs pa bshams la /
analyzed: gtor ma la sogs pa bshams la /
translated: Arrange the bali offerings, and so on.

original: dang por tshogs bsags pa'i phyir phyag 'tshal ba @117b nas dge ba'i rtsa ba yan chod bya /
analyzed: dang por tshogs bsags pa'i phyir phyag 'tshal ba @117b nas dge ba'i rtsa ba yan chod bya /
translated: First, in order to accumulate the accumulations, perform the preliminary practices up to the roots of virtue.

original: de nas skad cig gis rang bcom ldan 'das mar bskyed /
analyzed: de nas skad cig gis rang bcom ldan 'das mar bskyed /
translated: Then, in an instant, one generates oneself as Bhagavatī.

original: snying gnas 'od zer spros la ye shes sems dpa' dgug gzhug bya /
analyzed: snying gnas 'od zer spros la ye shes sems dpa' dgug gzhug bya /
translated: Light rays emanate from the heart and the awareness beings are invoked and dissolved.

original: gnyis su med pa'i bcom ldan 'das ma gsal bar bsgom /
analyzed: gnyis su med pa'i bcom ldan 'das ma gsal bar bsgom /
translated: Meditate on the Bhagavatī as nondual.

original: yi ge gsum gyis lus ngag yid gsum byin gyis brlab /
analyzed: yi ge gsum gyis lus ngag yid gsum byin gyis brlab /
translated: Bless the body, speech, and mind with the three syllables.

original: dngos su 'byor na rab /
analyzed: dngos su 'byor na rab /
translated: If one has the actual articles, it is best.

original: ma 'byor na ting nge 'dzin gyis mchod pa bya /
analyzed: ma 'byor na ting nge 'dzin gyis mchod pa bya /
translated: If one does not have them, one should make offerings with samādhi.

original: de nas ting nge 'dzin dang ma bral bar bzlas pa thun re la nyis stong re bya /
analyzed: de nas ting nge 'dzin dang ma bral bar bzlas pa thun re la nyis stong re bya /
translated: Then, without separating from samādhi, recite the mantra. In each session, recite two thousand.

original: zhag gcig la bzhi'am lngar bsgom /
analyzed: zhag gcig la bzhi'am lngar bsgom /
translated: Meditate for four or five days.

original: bzlas pa 'bum bzlas pa'i tshe bsnyen pa rdzogs so //
analyzed: bzlas pa 'bum bzlas pa'i tshe bsnyen pa rdzogs so //
translated: When one recites one hundred thousand mantras, the recitation is complete.

original: sgrub pa ni dang po bum pa dang rnam lnga dang gtor ma gtsang ma gang bar bsham /
analyzed: sgrub pa ni dang po bum pa dang rnam lnga dang gtor ma gtsang ma gang bar bsham /
translated: For the practice, first arrange the vase, the five, and a pure bali offering.

original: khye'u'am bu mo gtsang ma sngar nas nyer bsngogs bya /
analyzed: khye'u'am bu mo gtsang ma sngar nas nyer bsngogs bya /
translated: A pure boy or girl should be prepared beforehand.

original: khrus bya / kha zas bzang pos tshim bar bya /
analyzed: khrus bya / kha zas bzang pos tshim bar bya /
translated: Bathe them and satisfy them with good food.

original: bum pa sbos chu gtsang mas dgang /
analyzed: bum pa sbos chu gtsang mas dgang /
translated: Fill the vase with clean water.

original: de'i nang du skad cig gis lha mor bskyed /
analyzed: de'i nang du skad cig gis lha mor bskyed /
translated: Instantly generate the deity within it.

original: ye shes pa dgug gzhug bya /
analyzed: ye shes pa dgug gzhug bya /
translated: Summon and absorb the awareness being.

original: sku gsung thugs byin gyis brlab /
analyzed: sku gsung thugs byin gyis brlab /
translated: Consecrate the body, speech, and mind.

original: mchod pa dbul /
analyzed: mchod pa dbul /
translated: Make offerings.

original: de 'od du zhu ba las bdud rtsir gyur par bsam /
analyzed: de 'od du zhu ba las bdud rtsir gyur par bsam /
translated: Think that it melts into light and becomes elixir.

original: de nas skad cig gis bdag nyid lha mor bskyed /
analyzed: de nas skad cig gis bdag nyid lha mor bskyed /
translated: Then instantly generate yourself as the deity.

original: ye shes sems dpa' bstim /
analyzed: ye shes sems dpa' bstim /
translated: Absorb the awareness being.

original: sku gsung thugs byin gyis brlab /
analyzed: sku gsung thugs byin gyis brlab /
translated: Consecrate the body, speech, and mind.

original: mchod pa lnga dbul /
analyzed: mchod pa lnga dbul /
translated: Make the five offerings.

original: de nas khye'u'am bu mo skad cig gis lha mor bskyed /
analyzed: de nas khye'u'am bu mo skad cig gis lha mor bskyed /
translated: Then instantly generate the boy or girl as the deity.

original: ye shes sems dpa' bstim /
analyzed: ye shes sems dpa' bstim /
translated: Absorb the awareness being.

original: sku gsung thugs byin gyis brlab /
analyzed: sku gsung thugs byin gyis brlab /
translated: Consecrate the body, speech, and mind.

original: mchod pa rnam lnga dbul /
analyzed: mchod pa rnam lnga dbul /
translated: Make the five offerings.

original: de nas rtsa ba'i lha mor bsams la /
analyzed: de nas rtsa ba'i lha mor bsams la /
translated: Then imagine the root deity.

original: gnas gsum la mchod pa dbul /
analyzed: gnas gsum la mchod pa dbul /
translated: Make offerings to the three places.

original: de nas snod la chags pa'i dud pas snag tsha byas te mthe bong bsku /
analyzed: de nas snod la chags pa'i dud pas snag tsha byas te mthe bong bsku /
translated: Then make ink with the smoke that adheres to the vessel, and anoint the thumb.

original: de nas mthe bong gi rtsa mtheb 'dzub  gnyis kyis bzung la /
analyzed: de nas mthe bong gi rtsa mtheb 'dzub  gnyis kyis bzung la /
translated: Then hold the base of the thumb with both the thumb and index finger.

original: bsgom zhing bzlas pa byas /
analyzed: bsgom zhing bzlas pa byas /
translated: Meditate and do the recitation.

original: khye'u'am bu mo mthe bong blta ru gzhug cing /
analyzed: khye'u'am bu mo mthe bong blta ru gzhug cing /
translated: Have the boy or girl look at the thumb.

original: ji ltar mthong ba bzhin smra ru gzhug ;
analyzed: ji ltar mthong ba bzhin smra ru gzhug ;
translated: Let them speak as they have seen.

original: aom hrim hrim khrim khrim khyum khyum dha na h'um phat sv'a h'a /
analyzed: aom hrim hrim khrim khrim khyum khyum dha na h'um phat sv'a h'a /
translated: Oṃ hrīṃ hrīṃ khrīṃ khrīṃ khyūṃ khyūṃ dhana hūṃ phaṭ svāhā.

original: zhes pa rdo rje phag mo'i pra brtag pa rdzogs so//
analyzed: zhes pa rdo rje phag mo'i pra brtag pa rdzogs so//
translated: This concludes the Prajñā Examination of Vajravārāhī.
